definition: surname Wei/vassal state during the Zhou Dynasty (1066-221 BC), located in present day Henan and Hebei Provinces
to guard/to protect/to defend/abbr. for 衛生|卫生, hygiene/health/abbr. for 衛生間|卫生间, toilet

sentences.english: Frigates are a vital part of any balanced sea-going fleet.
sentences.chinese: 護衛艦是任何一個配置均衡的遠洋艦隊所必需的。

sentences.english: The program was trimmed to six frigates from the proposed eight.
sentences.chinese: 該計劃把護衛艦數量從8艘削減至6艘。

sentences.english: This is a new type of frigate with strong power of military attack.
sentences.chinese: 這是艘新型的護衛艦，具有很強的軍事打擊力。

sentences.english: The squadron was assigned to the Headquarters Frigate, Home One.
sentences.chinese: 俠盜中隊被派遣到總部護衛艦“家園一號”上。

sentences.english: The similar diesel engine is used by the French La Fayette class frigate.
sentences.chinese: 相似的柴油引擎爲法國拉菲特級護衛艦使用。

sentences.english: The navy's fleet of frigates, amphibious vessels, and other surface ships, will also be cut.
sentences.chinese: 海軍護衛艦，水陸兩棲艦，以及其他船艦也將被裁減。

sentences.english: The frigate made for the open sea.
These ships are based on the Chinese Jiangwei II class frigates.
sentences.chinese: 這些戰艦是基於中國的江衛ii型護衛艦。

definition: Takeshima (Korean Dokdo 獨島|独岛[Du2 dao3]), disputed islands in Sea of Japan
